ModMetaData.name: Upgraded Nutrient Paste Dispenser
ModMetaData.description: Ever been willing to give up an arm and leg just so you could have something than nutrient paste come out the dispenser? Well, now you can! Combine steel, gold, plasteel, components, and advanced components to be able to build the new Upgraded Nutrient Paste Dispenser!
ModMetaData.author: PBSpiralGamer
